description: Number of certain rooted planar maps.
references: W. G. Brown, Enumeration of non-separable planar maps, Canad. J. Math., 15 (1963), 526-545.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..200
W. G. Brown, Enumeration of non-separable planar maps [Annotated scanned copy]
formula: a(1)=1; a(n)=2*binomial(3*n-3, n-1)/(2*n-1) for n>=2. a(n)=2*A001764(n-1) for n>=2. - _Emeric Deutsch_, Mar 03 2004G.f.: (1+g)/(1-g) where g*(1-g)^2 = x. - _Mark van Hoeij_, Nov 10 2011
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
